TEXT: "Everyone has gone to Slay the Spire 2, why are you still starting here?" However, this time Neow gave the Defect not Lament, but an old, worn book NL —'Still getting caught by Little Red? No way, no way! (※Deep Learning Even the Fourth Strong Can Learn)'. NL Thus, our machine begins its new journey up the tower. Can it win the Slay the Spire 2 revival tournament? (Though it seems to start even slower?)
Strangers I've never seen, don't block my way! I'm in a hurry to get to Slay the Spire 2!
